name: The Ms-Adventures of Janet and Sachi
name_original: The Ms-Adventures of Janet and Sachi
description:
Virtua-scapes is looking for volunteers to test out it's next gen hardware.  How far will Janet and Sachi go in their race against time while competing against some of the very best?

This is a short 2 level demo made for the 2022 Returners Gam Jam hosted by AmalgamAsh.
